scripts.clean: rm -rf .firebase dist node_modules functions/node_modules components/node_modules components/.svelte-kit components/dist components/components components/build
scripts.install-deps: pnpm i && cd functions && pnpm i && cd ../components && pnpm i
scripts.build:minify: html-minifier --file-ext html --input-dir public -c minify.conf --output-dir dist && cp -r public/js dist/js && cp -r public/images dist/images && cp -r public/css dist/css && cp -r public/documents dist/documents && cp -r public/manifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run install-deps && npm run build:functions && npm run build:minify && npm run build:components
